DOC.brief_summary: Study circulatory level irisin response one session high-intensity resistance train group healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Circulatory Levels Irisin Response Acute Resistance Training
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : The purpose study study circulate level irisin response acute high-intensity resistance train group healthy young adult . Sample : The sample comprise adult men woman unpaid volunteer age 18 30 . We recruit 44 participant . Pre- screening assessment : Informed consent , PAR-Q , Medical History Exercise History use determine health status prior exercise experience . Menstrual cycle log require female participant . Pre-Intervention assessment ( baseline ) : - Anthropometric measurement Body Composition : Height , triceps , thigh calf skinfolds , biceps , thigh , hip , waist , calf circumference measure . Dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry ( DEXA ) perform obtain body composition . - Blood-related variable . Baseline glucose , lactate hematocrit obtain participant prior intervention . Lactate Hematocrit obtain pre-intervention post-intervention , within 1 min post workout . Irisin obtain blood sample baseline , train session . Irisin measure via commercial enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay . - Cardiopulmonary Strength Fitness Testing . Cardiopulmonary fitness determine via maximum oxygen consumption test . One maximum repetition ( 1-RM ) use assess muscular fitness . - Dietary Controls . Each participant complete Food Preference Questionnaire . In addition , Automated Self-Administered 24-hour Recall ( ASA24 ) collect day prior session . - Familiarization . Participant instruct muscle conditioning technique use strength train technique master . The rate perceive exertion ( RPE ) scale also use familiarization session . - Spontaneous Physical Activity : Daily activity level 7 day collect . Intervention : Resistance train consist circuit train 3 set 7 exercise focus major muscle group . Ten repetition circuit 70 % maximum capacity perform . Acute intervention consist one session . Blood collect pre-session , 45 min session , immediately acute intervention exposure ( post-session ) .
DOC.criteria: Participants 18 30 year old Males Females Healthy Participants known health problem cardiovascular , pulmonary metabolic disease exclude . Pregnant female exclude study . Any adult find take medication affect endocrine cardiovascular function also exclude study . Individuals find less 110 pound also exclude due collection blood study . Participants exercise three time per week strength train twice per week exclude . Individuals poor venous access express fear needle blood take also exclude . Cigarette smoking ( current quit within previous 6 month Hypertension Overweight obese Prediabetics
